# This script lists files needing to be ignored by the Open Hub
# code analysis service (http://www.openhub.net/p/ultradefrag/):

# exclude external libraries
Disallow: /src/console/getopt1.c
Disallow: /src/console/getopt.c
Disallow: /src/console/getopt.h
Disallow: /src/dll/zenwinx/prb.c
Disallow: /src/dll/zenwinx/prb.h
Disallow: /src/lua/
Disallow: /src/lua5.1/
Disallow: /src/lua-gui/
Disallow: /src/tools/patch/wx/

# exclude auto-generated stuff
Disallow: /src/dll/zenwinx/case-tables.h

# exclude documentation
Disallow: /doc/
Disallow: /src/dll/udefrag/rsc/
Disallow: /src/dll/zenwinx/rsc/
Disallow: /src/dll/zenwinx/index.html
Disallow: /src/rsc/
